info.name: Chrome New Tab - Attack on Titan
info.description: Attack on Titan (Shingeki no Kyojin) logo and characters on Google Chrome's new tab page. You can choose characters.
info.additionalInfo:
You might want to try these user styles:
  • style 99481 Fairy Tail logo and characters.
  • style 98623 by user 166295. Google Chrome New Tab like Safari top sites.
  • style 100291 by user 262711. If you prefer a blank page for new tab, this style is for you.
